description: Permission checking and level management functions for 6-level permission system

functions.name: getLevel
functions.description: Get the permission level for a user based on their role

functions.name: canAccess
functions.description: Check if user has required permission level to access a resource

functions.name: isModeratorOrAbove
functions.description: Check if user is moderator level (3) or higher

functions.name: isAdminOrAbove
functions.description: Check if user is admin level (4) or higher

functions.name: levels
functions.description: Permission level constants (PUBLIC=1, USER=2, MODERATOR=3, ADMIN=4, GOD=5, SUPERGOD=6)
